name: Robert J. AULETTI and Antoinette Aulette, His Wife, Petitioners, v. Diane KELLY, Respondent
docket_number: Petition No. 514 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1997

parties: Robert J. AULETTI and Antoinette Aulette, His Wife, Petitioners, v. Diane KELLY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW this 15th day of April, 1998, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted, the Order of the Superior Court is reversed and the matter is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Monroe County for consideration of the motion for judgment of non pros based upon Jacobs v. Halloran, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1098 (Pa.1998) and Marino v. Hackman, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1108 (Pa.1998). The Motion to Supplement the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John B. Dunn, Stroudsburg, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
707 A.2d 1141
Robert J. AULETTI and Antoinette Aulette, His Wife, Petitioners, v. Diane KELLY, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 15, 1998.
John B. Dunn, Stroudsburg, for petitioner.
